title: Bug 114470 [Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: Encountered an issue when using new Date('3/2/2005') in the table filter.
OB: Error message appears on the report page due to data conversion issues when using new Date('3/2/2005') in the table filter.
EB: Upon saving and previewing, the filter should work without errors. The expected result is a functional filter without any error messages. The actual result is encountering errors on the report page, specifically related to data conversion: data.engine.DataConversionError occurs (1 time) with the details stating that an error happened in data type conversion, and it cannot convert the value to Date.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application and navigate to the specified table (table8).
2. Apply a filter using the value new Date('3/2/2005').
3. Save the changes.
4. Preview the report.

Expected behavior:
The filter should work without errors.

Actual behavior:
Error messages appear on the report page, indicating a data conversion issue with new Date('3/2/2005').
